issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: ACID: Skip decoding the ROW__ID sections for read-only queries

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: LLAP IO may not handle ORC files that have row index disabled correctly for queries with no columns selected

comments.body: [~gopalv] can you take a look? the non-test part of the change is small

Code changes LGTM - +1 tests pending.

There's no testconfiguration.properties for this change, so the ptest will not run vector_acid4.q?
